turns.text: Me too.  Those commercials make me so sad!   In the U.S. and around the world, Save the Children does whatever it takes ¡ª every day and in times of crisis ¡ª to ensure children grow up healthy, learning and safe. Learn about the places we work, the challenges children face and the results we achieve, thanks to supporters like me and you.
